Articles.Content: On MacOS Ksp 1.0.5 gets stuck on the loading screen. The bar doesn't move, the slideshow and hints keep going, but nothing loads. No mods installed, nothing tampered with. Please help!

1.0.5 is a pretty old version, unless you have a good reason, you might want to update to 1.2.2.

Anyway, we need more information to be able to help you, please read the following thread:
